Articles.Content: A Realism Overhaul config for the Dreamchaser would be nifty ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Yup. Should be easier than the shuttle.

I can make a basic one but mught not have time to fine tune the aero or whatever.
I wonder could the crew capacity be changed from the current 4 to the real one's 7 without too much hassle.

> 
> I wonder could the crew capacity be changed from the current 4 to the real one's 7 without too much hassle.

done.

also testing the RO config now

so close. adjusting thrusts...

guess I should add FAR quickly too

this includes RO patch.

its not finished and has issues to be fixed when I have time.

its there for anyone who wants to have a go at editing it.

Maybe an idea...... Make an IDA (international docking adapter)

I completely agree! That would be great! I think I've said it in the past, but i don't remember.

Mike, I tested out the pack, and both rockets just flip out at some point, and they are near uncontrollable.

should of tested that I guess... my bad
it may have to wait I have gotten rather busy again. or if anyone wants to edit it...
And, for when you have time, Would it be possible to work on the dreamchaser model? I feel like the proportions of it all are off.

> 
> And, for when you have time, Would it be possible to work on the dreamchaser model? I feel like the proportions of it all are off.

can I have some examples on how it needs to be changed?

I am unable to get the main solar panels of the ISS to rotate. I thought maybe I assembled it incorrectly, but when I tried using the prebuilt config and some cheats to get it into orbit it had the same issue. Solar panels are tracking the Sun by rotating around the truss, but the truss is not rotating so that they lay flat (with the copula of the ISS down as it would be, the panels are aligned with the radial axis rather than prograde/retrograde in order to have full panel in view of Sun).

![kbown5.png](http://i57.tinypic.com/kbown5.png)

EDIT: Added Photo

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-27T05:02:28Z" title="08/27/2015 05:02  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 27, 2015</time> by Aviator17**

checking now...

- - - Updated - - -

I notice the large radiators are pointing wrong position.

also with ksp limitations, I made it so mechjeb rotates the trusses for aiming solar panels.

once rotated, the solar panels will swivel correctly...

![mA8ArpT.png](http://i.imgur.com/mA8ArpT.png)![piilHuF.png](http://i.imgur.com/piilHuF.png)

I will look into how I can get this to be automatic
